forum.content:
if I were a painter
I would paint my reverie
if that's the only way for u to be with me
we,d be there together
just like we used to be
underneath the swirling skies for all to see
And I will dreaming of a place
where I could see ur face
And I think my brush would take me there
But only....
if I will a painter
And could paint a memory
I,d climb inside the swirling skies to be with u
I,d climb inside the skies to be with u
forum.title: Painter Song 分享一下
